title: Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information referred
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Job Vacancy Survey) Order
text_raw: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Job Vacancy Survey) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (job vacancy survey) order

title: Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information referred
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information referred
heading: In this Order, “survey” means the Job Vacancy Survey conducted by the
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “survey” means the Job Vacancy Survey conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information referred 
to in Article 4.
text_norm: 2 order survey mean job vacancy survey conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information referred article 4

title: Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information referred
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under any section, other than sections A, T or U, of NACE Rev. 2 set 
out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 20 December 20061 as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 
295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 20082, 
Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 
18 January 20123 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 20 June 20194.
text_norm: 3 order applies undertaking classified statistical purpose section section u nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 european parliament council 20 december 20061 amended regulation (ec) no 295 2008 european parliament council 11 march 20082 regulation (eu) no 70 2012 european parliament council 18 january 20123 regulation (eu) 2019 1243 european parliament council 20 june 20194

title: Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information referred
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings referred to in Article 3 to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings referred to in Article 3 to provide, 
annually in the years 2021 to 2025 and for the purposes of the survey, 
information the general nature of which is specified in the Schedule, in relation 
to the last working day of the month of June of the year concerned, is hereby 
prescribed. 

1 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13. 
3 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1. 
4 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 SCHEDULE 

[107] 3 

Article 4.
text_norm: 4 requirement undertaking referred article 3 provide annually year 2021 2025 purpose survey information general nature specified schedule relation last working day month june year concerned hereby prescribed 1 oj no l 393 30.12.2006 p 1 2 oj no l 97 9.4.2008 p 13 3 oj no l 32 3.2.2012 p 1 4 oj no l 198 25.7.2019 p 241 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 12th march 2021 schedule 107 3 article 4

title: Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information referred
heading: Information, regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking
text_raw:
1. 

Information, regarding the following, as it relates to the undertaking 

concerned, and specifying the date to which the information relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

total number of job vacancies; 

the number of job vacancies by occupation; 

the number of job vacancies that relate to the replacement of 
existing staff; 

(d) 

the number of job vacancies that relate to new roles.
text_norm: 1 information regarding following relates undertaking concerned specifying date information relates (a) (b) (c) total number job vacancy number job vacancy occupation number job vacancy relate replacement existing staff (d) number job vacancy relate new role

title: Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining the information referred
heading: Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to complete
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the undertaking concerned to complete 
the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director General for the 
collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 March, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
